004
005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command;
006
007import static edu.wpi.first.util.ErrorMessages.requireNonNullParam;
008
009import edu.wpi.first.util.sendable.Sendable;
010import edu.wpi.first.util.sendable.SendableBuilder;
011import edu.wpi.first.util.sendable.SendableRegistry;
012import java.util.HashSet;
013import java.util.Set;
014
015/**
016 * A {@link Sendable} base class for {@link Command}s.
017 *
018 * <p>This class is provided by the NewCommands VendorDep
019 */
020public abstract class CommandBase implements Sendable, Command {
021  protected Set<Subsystem> m_requirements = new HashSet<>();
022
023  protected CommandBase() {
024    String name = getClass().getName();
025    SendableRegistry.add(this, name.substring(name.lastIndexOf('.') + 1));
026  }
027
028  /**
029   * Adds the specified requirements to the command.
030   *
031   * @param requirements the requirements to add
032   */
033  public final void addRequirements(Subsystem... requirements) {
034    for (Subsystem requirement : requirements) {
035      m_requirements.add(requireNonNullParam(requirement, "requirement", "addRequirements"));
036    }
037  }
038
039  @Override
040  public Set<Subsystem> getRequirements() {
041    return m_requirements;
042  }
043
044  @Override
045  public String getName() {
046    return SendableRegistry.getName(this);
047  }
048
049  /**
050   * Sets the name of this Command.
051   *
052   * @param name name
053   */
054  public void setName(String name) {
055    SendableRegistry.setName(this, name);
056  }
057
058  /**
059   * Decorates this Command with a name. Is an inline function for #setName(String);
060   *
061   * @param name name
062   * @return the decorated Command
063   */
064  public CommandBase withName(String name) {
065    this.setName(name);
066    return this;
067  }
068
069  /**
070   * Gets the subsystem name of this Command.
071   *
072   * @return Subsystem name
073   */
074  public String getSubsystem() {
075    return SendableRegistry.getSubsystem(this);
076  }
077
078  /**
079   * Sets the subsystem name of this Command.
080   *
081   * @param subsystem subsystem name
082   */
083  public void setSubsystem(String subsystem) {
084    SendableRegistry.setSubsystem(this, subsystem);
085  }
086
087  /**
088   * Initializes this sendable. Useful for allowing implementations to easily extend SendableBase.
089   *
090   * @param builder the builder used to construct this sendable
091   */
092  @Override
093  public void initSendable(SendableBuilder builder) {
094    builder.setSmartDashboardType("Command");
095    builder.addStringProperty(".name", this::getName, null);
096    builder.addBooleanProperty(
097        "running",
098        this::isScheduled,
099        value -> {
100          if (value) {
101            if (!isScheduled()) {
102              schedule();
103            }
104          } else {
105            if (isScheduled()) {
106              cancel();
107            }
108          }
109        });
110    builder.addBooleanProperty(
111        ".isParented", () -> CommandGroupBase.getGroupedCommands().contains(this), null);
112  }
113}
